bug.short_desc: [1.8][code assist + compiler] compiler and code assist problem in multilevel lambda with curly bracketed body

long_desc.thetext:
Code assist works fine in this example having been fixed by other recent resolved bugzilla(s). However I noticed that this test case triggers an NPE if the semicolon in the return statement is removed.
Fix and tests for that problem released here: http://git.eclipse.org/c/jdt/eclipse.jdt.core.git/commit/?h=BETA_JAVA8&id=31f5d8c3352dfd40743cbafcdc19d9f5e7640d54
